item.title: NILFS2 File-System Seeing Renewed Interest With Additional Maintainer
item.description: It's been a while since having anything major to talk about with the NILFS2 file-system but it looks like that could be changing. NILFS2 as a reminder is a log-structured file-system with continuous snapshotting with its NILFS predecessor having been in the mainline kernel for two decades since the mid Linux 2.6 days...

Samsung Mobile Flaw Exploited as Zero-Day to Deploy LANDFALL Android Spyware
item.description:
A now-patched security flaw in Samsung Galaxy Android devices was exploited as a zero-day to deliver a "commercial-grade" Android spyware dubbed LANDFALL in targeted attacks in the Middle East.
